title: Barnaby the Firefly and His Missing Light
description: A tale about a fireflyWho can't light up his fanny,A tale to make you laugh and sigh, A sweet and comic double whammy! Barnaby's butt won't light up. And this is a problem. It's hard to call yourself a firefly when you're always dim and never bright. Determined to find what's missing, Barnaby goes on an adventure that takes him all the way to the moon and back. With clever rhymes, earnest charm, and silly humor, this adorably illustrated, hard cover children's book will light up your night.www.peachwoodpublishing.com
author: Norman T. Leonard
